  • All Superinterfaces:
    FocusHolder, InputListenerController
    All Known Subinterfaces:

    All Known Implementing Classes:

extends InputListenerController, FocusHolder

        C getFocused()
        If this ComponentsContainer itself is not focused, this will return null
        Specified by:
        getFocused in interface FocusHolder
        Returns:
